editorialNotes.short: Everything a well-dressed man needs, all in one place.
editorialNotes.standard: We’re not sure whether Mr. Porter is a real person, but we’d love to shake his well-manicured hand for helping us look so dapper. With this impeccably crisp and easy-to-navigate app, we can shop for a massive selection of menswear—everything from cozy J. Crew flannel to stunning Berluti shoes. Gorgeous images let us inspect every stitch and seam.
